title-part.text: DOMESTIC- OR SPACE-HEATING SYSTEMS, e.g. CENTRAL HEATING SYSTEMS

reference.text: using steam or condensate extracted or exhausted from steam engine plants for heating purposes F01K17/02

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass, the following expression is used with the meaning indicated: "Central heating system" means a system in which heat is generated or stored at central sources and is distributed by means of a transfer fluid to the spaces or areas to be heated.

note-paragraph.CPC-specific-note: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.
